pullRequest.title: Introduce @BeforeGroup and @AfterGroup functions to the test suite
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Introduces @BeforeGroup and @AfterGroup functions to the test suite
Also contains a bug fix in the test.bal templates

Fixes #24925
Fixes #25163
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

beforeCommit.message: Remove unnecessary newlines from test.bal template files

afterCommit.message: Remove unnecessary newlines from test.bal template files

nodes.bodyText: Shall we add "beforeSuite" function as well to the test?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,76 @@

+// under the License.
+
+# Test file to test the test execution behavior when @BeforeGroups and @AfterGroups functions
+# are defined. The expected behavior is that, each @BeforeGroups function will execute before the first
+# test of that group is executed and each @AfterGroups function will execute after the
+# last test of that group is executed.
+
+import ballerina/io;
+import ballerina/test;
+
+string a = "";
+
+@test:BeforeGroups { value : ["g1"] }

commit.message: Introduce @BeforeGroup and @AfterGroup functions to the test suite
Remove unnecessary newlines from test.bal template files

beforeCommit.message: Remove unnecessary newlines from test.bal template files
